Never mind my above post :-/

1) Extract Mafia II iso to your hard disk or mount DVD
2) Install Phoenix and run it
3)Click Instruments, move the mouse over \'Update ContentDescriptionRecord\', select internet. This way it knows what game this is.
4)Click Instruments, SID Unpacker
5)Select Scan a SIM-File, navigate to the extracted image and select Mafia II_disk1.sim, should be the only one able to be selected.
6)Select Mafia 2 under available games.
7)Click unpack and choice your desired install directory.
No sound in-game or in cutscenes; just in FMVs
